Time Configuration

Enabling Fake Tone Signal

The fake tone is defined in the mission configuration header file.

If this selection is enabled, TIME will generate a "fake" tone signal by calling the same API function as would be called upon detection of the "real" tone signal. Enable the fake tone only for hardware configurations that do not provide a tone signal.

  #define CFE_TIME_CFG_FAKE_TONE

Hypothetical hardware configuration number one (described above) would enable the fake tone signal.

See also:
CFE_TIME_CFG_FAKE_TONE
NOTE: Any "See Also" items which are not linked are not currently specified for the platform this documentation was generated for.
